readable.title: 3703413486_3c682732a0
readable.content: A boy sticks an aligator puppet out of a camper van window . Two boys looking out the window of an RV . Two boys peer out the window of a RV while one holds a stuffed toy . Two children peek out the window of an RV with a pet snake . Two young boys lean out the window of a white RV with their stuffed toy snake .
